sect3.title: The logical data hierarchy
sect3.para: The monitoring service is not used directly by application code but rather steered via user level IMonitoring interface. Only CORAL plugins use this service directly to record any monitoring event when it happens.

sect3.title: Controlling MonitoringService parameters
sect3.para: The events recording may happen at different levels configurable via coral::IMonitoring user level interface. The level determines the granurality of the recored information from informational up to the low level details about various steps performed by CORAL plugins to be used mostly for debugging purposes.
